label: InspectionReference
comment: The identification of related information for an inspection.

datatypeProperties.comment: An abbreviation, expressed as text, for this supply chain reference.
A comment, expressed as text for this MDH illness.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A code specifying a property reference for this supply chain reference.
A status, expressed as text, for this acknowledgement document.
A value, expressed as text, for this document characteristic.
A code specifying a value for this specified range.

referencedBy.comment: An inspection reference specified for this inspection result.
